nodes.text: Jestra Andrim was a female individual who was a member of House Andrim, a Kuati noble house. At some point during the reign of the Galactic Empire, House Andrim sent an operative to the Belgaroth system, to spy on some weapons tests that were to be performed by the Star Destroyers Burning Vengeance and Legacy. To collect the data that their operative had recovered, Jestra approached a group of agents that were stopping over on Kuat and requested that they perform a courier mission for her. She them invited the agents to an evening party in House Andrim's manor on the surface of Kuat, where she discussed with them the details of the assignment, then dispatched them to the Belgaroth system.
